landing.title: Welcome to Ignis!
landing.subtitle: Upload your files to get started

download_all_form.title: Download All Files as One PDF
download_all_form.description: The files will be merged in the order shown in the UI.
download_all_form.p1: Set the file name for the exported PDF. Optionally, set a password to encrypt the PDF.
download_all_form.p2: In the future, you will be able to select the PDF version and encryption algorithm here.
download_all_form.p3: Note: PDF features like links or interactive elements will not be preserved, as the file will be saved as a new PDF.

download_form.title: Download PDF with Password
download_form.p1: You can protect this PDF file with a password. If you set a password, the downloaded PDF will require it to open.
download_form.p2: In the future, you will be able to select the PDF version and encryption algorithm here.
download_form.p3: Note: PDF features like links or interactive elements will not be preserved, as the file will be saved as a new PDF.

decryption.title: Decryption Required
decryption.description: This PDF file is encrypted. Please enter the password to view it.
decryption.note: Note: This app cannot open AES-256 encrypted files.
